title: Starbucks, Airbnb Help to Resettle Afghan Evacuees Off U.S. Military Bases
sub_head: More than half of the evacuees have been processed and are moving to local communities
body:
WASHINGTON— Starbucks Corp. and CVS Health Corp. and Airbnb Inc.’s nonprofit arm are among the organizations joining the effort to help thousands of Afghan evacuees move off U.S. military bases and into local communities, though their needs still outstrip supplies, charitable officials said this week.
A total of 74,000 Afghans were brought to the U.S. after the evacuation effort that followed Kabul’s fall to the Taliban this summer.
